column4: Anybody know where I can get the old ATI drivers? I mean, the ones from the Edgy repo - are they still they same perhaps?
waddledee: amarok is good but you need KDE too
So nobody knows if the ATI driver in the Edgy repo is the same as the one in the feisty repo?
TehRealNexGen: thanks for the suggestions.  I'll look into them.
